short_description_localized.en: Book this package and you'll receive two complimentary drinks to the Cloud Social rooftop bar with breathtaking views of the Empire State Building.  When you click to book this special you'll see the available room rates.  Ask the Front Desk for more location details upon your arrival. The package includes drinks at the Cloud Social rooftop bar.  This rooftop bar is located across the street at our sister property, nyma, The New York Manhattan Hotel.
